description:
Ecopetrol and Colombia’s security forces have agreed to coordinate efforts to fight oil theft, which allegedly cost the state-run oil company $936 million (COP3.6 trillion) since 2019. According to Ecopetrol,…

The post Colombia’s state-run oil company lost more than 5M barrels to thieves since 2019 appeared first on Colombia News | Colombia Reports.
title: Colombia’s state-run oil company lost more than 5M barrels to thieves since 2019
